main event: Numerous witnesses reported seeing a brilliant white, oval-shaped UFO with a triple exhaust trail in Crescent City, California, on 8 October 1960.
interesting points: The object was initially detected by radar and exhibited high-speed zigzagging motion before coming to a complete stop,The object hovered and then disappeared rapidly,It was reported that the object oscillated or wobbled while moving at an estimated speed of 500-700 mph,The sighting included a visual observation lasting approximately 20 seconds,Negative radar reports indicated no aircraft in the area during the sighting.
sighted object: brilliant white oval-shaped craft with triple exhaust trail
witness description: Local contacts, including a six-year-old boy and several corroborating witnesses.
